code: import React from'react';import Chip from'@mui/material/Chip';import RenderTextField from'./RenderTextField';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var DateSelection=function DateSelection(props){var updateParam=props.updateParam,updateHelpFor=props.updateHelpFor,date=props.date,sdate=props.sdate,edate=props.edate,datetype=props.datetype,setDatetype=props.setDatetype;var handleChipClick=function handleChipClick(){if(datetype==='pair'){updateParam({sdate:"",edate:"",date:sdate});setDatetype("single");}else{updateParam({date:"",sdate:date});setDatetype("pair");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chip,{label:datetype==='pair'?"Change to single date":"Change to start/end dates",clickable:true,variant:"outlined",onClick:handleChipClick}),datetype==='pair'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RenderTextField,{id:"sdate",fieldlabel:"Start date",value:sdate,updateHelpFor:updateHelpFor,updateParam:updateParam}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RenderTextField,{id:"edate",fieldlabel:"End date",value:edate,updateHelpFor:updateHelpFor,updateParam:updateParam})]}),datetype==='single'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RenderTextField,{id:"date",fieldlabel:"Date",value:date,updateHelpFor:updateHelpFor,updateParam:updateParam})]});};export default DateSelection;
